entry.title: MarziaYarzada/Stocky: Stocky is a lightweight inventory management system built with Express.js and Prisma ORM. It helps you track, update, and manage your warehouse stock efficiently.
entry.content: Stocky is a lightweight inventory management system built with Express.js and Prisma ORM. It helps you track, update, and manage your warehouse stock efficiently.

entry.title: actioncrew/streamix: Streamix is a lightweight reactive library that adopts known RxJS operators while using a simpler, generator-based approach for flexible and efficient data streams.

entry.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
entry.content: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

entry.title: Ali7med/AZ-Validator: is a lightweight and flexible TypeScript library for data validation. It provides a comprehensive set of built-in validators and an easy way to create custom validation rules. With a simple API, you can quickly integrate robust validation logic into your projects, ensuring data integrity with clear and concise examples for each validator
